Description.Text: This luxurious 5-star hotel was inaugurated in June 2008 and consists of a main building and its surroundings built on an area of 28 000 m2, and it is located in Kartal, the modern commercial centre of the Asian continent. The hotel has been designed in the light of the Business hotel concept in a manner to meet the expectations of the congresses and the businessmen; it is the only 5 star with unique features of the Asian side of Istanbul where functionality and elegance are presented. The hotel features: the Brasserie and Patisserie which offer the best examples of refined Italian cuisine, the bars offer magnificent views where guests can taste different cocktail varieties accompanied by live music, the a la carte restaurants offer gourmet tastes, the beautiful meeting halls and ballroom dedicated to events, the Wellness and Ocean Spa with its holistic concept, a half Olympic heated pool with a view of the islands, fitness centre equipped with the latest model technologic equipments, table tennis, dart, billiards, basketball facilities, mini club for children, gift stores, hairdresser, photography and flowers services are available. For businessmen and select customers, all facilities that they would require is provided at the executive Lounge and the Business Centre by the professional teams.
